Name: Base Case
Description: The base case run of the most recent stock assessments

Name: Lower M
Description: Natural mortality (M) was assumed to be the lower value considered in the sensitivity tests of the assessments

Name: Higher M
Description: Natural mortality (M) was assumed to be the higher value considered in the sensitivity tests of the assessments

Name: Reduced Recreational Removals
Description: The assessment models were re-run with removals of the recreational fleet reduced by 40%

Name: Effort Creep
Description: Same as Base Case except that the effort of the General Recreational fleet increased by 2% per year in the projection period

Name: Recent Recruitment
Description: Same as Base Case except that the recruitment deviations for the projection period were based on the 10 most recent historical years rather than the entire historical period
